metadata.title: Hayiodda Tall Bathroom Storage Cabinet Organizer, Linen Tower Bathroom Cabinet with Adjustable Shelves & Acrylic Door, White
features: 【Modern Versatile Bathroom Cabinet】Featuring a sleek and classic look in light color, the top and bottom panel has a beautiful curve design, the grove pattern and acrylic panel door add more elegance to your home. This freestanding storage cabinet is not only a great bath cabinet for toiletries, but also can be put in the living room, kitchen, study to organize your living space.

【Premium Material】The bathroom cabinet is crafted with premium P2 level MDF boards, quality metal drawer handle and door hinges hardware are included, sturdy and durable for many years of use. The brushed finish and acrylic panel door ensure exquisite elegance.

【Ample Storage Space】This linen tower cabinet features an above enclosed cabinet with an acrylic panel door, and one drawer and an another cabinet with door below, which can totally satisfy your daily storage needs. The adjustable shelves are flexible to accommodate different size items in your bathroom, meeting your various storage needs.

【Space-saving Design】With a slim and compact body, this bathroom cabinet organizer with a small footprint, making full use of limited space. You can put it in any narrow and compact space in your home. This storage cabinet also equips with an anti-tipping device which can enhance the stability and safety of the cabinet when in use.

【Easy to Clean and Install】All labeled parts and manual instruction are included in the package to help you accomplish a easy and quick assembly of this bathroom storage cabinet. The surface of the cabinet is smooth and water-proof, easy to clean and maintain with a damp cloth.
description: This elegant and practical modern freestanding storage cabinet is great in a variety of scenarios such as bathroom, kitchen, living room and balcony. Made from CARB P2 certified MDF board, coupled with high-quality hardwares and an anti-tipping device, this bathroom cabinet organizer is sturdy and stable for years of use. The graceful curve design of the top and bottom panels, and the grove pattern and an acrylic panel door greatly enhance the style and elegance of this cabinet. With its slim and compact body and large storage capacity, it is the perfect space-saving storage solution for your home.
Material: Certificated CARB P2 MDF board
